flavorText: Nireya reached through the Gate, sensing the energies trapped beyond.
name: Planar Gate
originalText: Creature spells you cast cost up to {2} less to cast.

rulings.text: Multiple Gates are cumulative. Two will reduce the cost by up to {4}, and so on.
Only works for its controller, not all players.
Only reduces the generic mana portion of a spell’s cost. If the cost does not include generic mana or includes less than {2}, you get a reduced or null effect from this card.
Works on all spells with the type Creature, even if the spell has another type like Artifact or Enchantment.

text: Creature spells you cast cost up to {2} less to cast.
